titles: A demonstration, that Hen. Meriton, John Meriton and Lau. Park, priests, of the country of Norfolk, in confederacy with Francis Bugg, were the challengers; and not the Quakers
author: Feddeman, John.
notes: Place of publication conjectured by and date from Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the Friends House Library, London.
